public static interface ViewerConfigurer.ICommonViewerContentProvider
extends org.eclipse.jface.viewers.IStructuredContentProvider, ViewerConfigurer.ControlFieldListener

A ContentProvider vor a CommonViewer. Has Methods to connect to a ControlField
